{"id":753981709,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1658517756,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/753981709/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"42.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n        if(s.length() == 0){\n            return 0;\n        }\n         else if(s.length() == 1){\n            return 1;\n        }\n        int longest = 0;\n        \n        int[] dict = new int[128];\n        \n        for(int l = 0, r = 0; r<s.length();r++){\n            l = Math.max(l, dict[s.charAt(r)]);\n            longest = Math.max(longest, r - l + 1);\n            dict[s.charAt(r)] = r+1;\n        }\n        \n        return longest;\n        \n}\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false}
